name: Avoid Process with too many Activities (TIBCO BW)
description: Processes should have less than a defined number of Activities. The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all  Processes having  too many Activities.
It provides the following information:
Process full name.
The associated value is the number of  Activities defined inside the Process.
rationale: For maintainability and readability reasons, classes should not have too many Activities.
remediation: Review the Process design to reduce the number of activities.
alternativeName: Avoid Process with too many Activities (TIBCO BW)

parameters.name: Max activities
parameters.description: Maximum nb of activities per process
